bidsprep
  • API
  • View page source

API

bidsprep.logger

Module setting up a logger.

setup_logger

Setup the logger.

bidsprep.io

Module for input/output operations on NIfTI files and images.

load_nifti

Load NIfTI image.

compress_image

Compresses a ".nii" image to a ".nii.gz" image.

get_files

Gets files with a specific extension.

get_nifti_header

Get header from NIfTI image.

get_nifti_affine

Get the affine matrix from NIfTI image.

create_bids_file

Create a BIDS compliant filename with required and optional entities.

create_dataset_description

Generate Dataset Description.

save_dataset_description

Save Dataset Description.

bidsprep.utils

Module containing utility functions.

determine_slice_dim

Determine the slice dimension

get_hdr_metadata

Get metadata from a NIfTI header.

get_n_slices

Gets the number of slices from the header of a NIfTI image.

get_tr

Get the Repetition Time from the header of a NIfTI image.

create_slice_timing

is_3d_img

Determines if nifti_file_or_img is a 3D image.

get_scanner_info

Determines the manufacturer and model namne of scanner.
